tool_description: AI-based freemium API for generating random user data with AI. Like Lorem Ipsum, but for people.

api_list.name: Get Random User
api_list.description: Fetches a random user profile based on specified parameters.

optional_parameters.name: results
optional_parameters.description: Number of random users to generate.

optional_parameters.name: nation
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the nationality of the generated users.

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the gender of the generated users.
